description: Use built-in parental controls on consoles, PCs and mobile devices to limit play time and content.
actions: Set age-appropriate restrictions, enable content filters, and schedule play hours. Use platform guides (Xbox/PlayStation/Nintendo, Epic).

description: Gaming accounts often default to social and friend-based features that expose children to strangers.
actions: Set profiles to private, restrict who can message or join games, and disable friend requests from unknown users.

description: Voice and text chat can expose children to abusive language, strangers, or grooming attempts.
actions: Disable voice/text chat for young accounts, use parental controls to limit who can contact your child, and teach them to leave uncomfortable conversations and report users.

description: Games often include purchases that can lead to accidental spending or pressure to buy.
actions: Require a parent password or approval for purchases, disable saved payment methods, and review receipts regularly.

description: Players may encounter strangers who ask personal questions or try to move conversations off-platform.
actions: Teach children not to share personal details (full name, address, school), to block and report suspicious users, and to get a parent's help if pressured.

description: Excessive play can affect sleep, schoolwork, and social development.
actions: Agree on daily/weekly limits, encourage breaks, and keep devices in shared family spaces during younger ages.

description: Most platforms provide in-app reporting, block features, and safety centers for parents and kids.
actions: Familiarize yourself with reporting flows on platforms you use (Roblox, Discord, Epic), save incident details, and escalate to platform support when needed.

description: Children's accounts can be targeted or hijacked; recovery can be difficult without parental contact info.
actions: Use strong, unique passwords, enable two-factor auth where available, and register recovery email/phone under a parent's account.

description: Understand each game's moderation level — some communities are heavily moderated while others are not.
actions: Choose servers, games, and communities with active moderation, and review community rules before joining.

description: Sharing photos or live-streaming can reveal location or identifying details unintentionally.
actions: Disable location sharing, avoid posting images showing identifiable places or school uniforms, and review privacy for streaming platforms.
